subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The Boston Bruins on Friday condemned racist slurs about P. K. Subban that appeared on social media after he scored the winning goal for the Montreal Canadiens in the second overtime of their playoff game Thursday night.
snippet: The Boston Bruins on Friday condemned racist slurs about P. K. Subban that appeared on social media after he scored the winning goal for the Montreal Canadiens in the second overtime of their playoff game Thursday night.
